name: In re Nomination Petition of Len STANGA, Candidate for the Office of Representative in the Pennsylvania General Assembly From the 31st Legislative District. Petition of Len STANGA

parties: In re Nomination Petition of Len STANGA, Candidate for the Office of Representative in the Pennsylvania General Assembly From the 31st Legislative District. Petition of Len STANGA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Motion to Quash Appeal and Strike Petition granted.
Larsen, Justice, did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard H. Luciana, Verona, for petitioner.
Michael J. Minney, Lancaster, for appellee.
S. Michael Streib, Pittsburgh, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
539 A.2d 809
In re Nomination Petition of Len STANGA, Candidate for the Office of Representative in the Pennsylvania General Assembly From the 31st Legislative District. Petition of Len STANGA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1988.
Decided April 18, 1988.
Richard E. Gingrich, pro se.
Richard H. Luciana, Verona, for petitioner.
Michael J. Minney, Lancaster, for appellee.
S. Michael Streib, Pittsburgh, for respondent.
